name: Memories (itch) (flubzies)
description:
Uncover the truth about your strange abyssal existence.
Hint: look around for clues that help you return!

Team 3:
Riley Clarke - Programmer/Generalist
Lee Peers - Artist
Ben Euden - Designer

SPOILERS

The game revolves around a patient experiencing a near-death event with the reaper. Memories of your loved ones will help you return to your life.
